## hpr3900 :: Preparing Podcasts for Listening

 Because I use very small and simple MP3 players, I have to do
pre-processing of my podcast files, and I use Audacity for that purpose.
I explain exactly how I do this in case it helps someone else.
Links:

http://hackerpublicradio.org/eps.php?id=1479
https://gpodder.net/
https://www.audacityteam.org/download/
https://www.palain.com/miscellaneous-technical-notes/preparing-podcasts-for-listening/
